name: Egglomania
summary:
Egglomania takes the logic of our best selling puzzle game BoXiKoN to a new dimension. Carefully fit your eggs into the tray forming lines in three directions at once. Eggs appear in ever increasing complexity of colors, patterns and arrangements. Eggs must be lined up and shipped out before they crack! Use your skills of organization and planning to ensure you never run out of space! Sounds easy? Give it a go!
Egglomania is an addictive arcade puzzle game; it's easy to play but hard to crack! A fresh addition to the classic puzzle game family.
